players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to be careful and share any info we have. Who did you all suspect most last night?"
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I have proof from my investigation last night."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me last night? You're making this up to get me arrested."
Diana: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, why did you investigate me instead of a more suspicious target? You're trying to frame me because you're the real mafia."
Bob: "Diana is lying to confuse us. I investigated her first because she was acting suspiciously, and the investigation confirmed she's mafia. Trust my role and vote to arrest Diana."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Charlie last night? He would have been the most logical first investigation target."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to be careful and share any info we have. Who did you all suspect most last night?"
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I have proof from my investigation last night."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate me last night? You're making this up to get me arrested."
Diana: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, why did you investigate me instead of a more suspicious target? You're trying to frame me because you're the real mafia."
You: "Diana is lying to confuse us. I investigated her first because she was acting suspiciously, and the investigation confirmed she's mafia. Trust my role and vote to arrest Diana."
Alice: "Bob, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Charlie last night? He would have been the most logical first investigation target."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
